description:
For itunes promotion:
You need to take a screenshot of the PHANTOMIME iTunes download purchase screen and submit it through the application form to access the demo track. Here’s the campaign page:

https://form.universal-music.co.jp/dl-moricalliope-phantomime/page/form.html
